GeneralDateTimeDescription.description: Description of date and time structured with separate values for the various elements of a calendar-clock system

timeZone.description: The time zone for clock elements in the temporal position
timeZone.title: Timezone

unitType.description: The temporal unit which provides the precision of a date-time value or scale of a temporal extent
unitType.title: Unittype

hasTRS.description: The temporal reference system used by a temporal position or extent description
hasTRS.title: Hastrs

year.description: Year position in a calendar-clock system. The range of this property is not specified, so can be replaced by any specific representation of a calendar year from any calendar.
year.title: Year

month.description: Month position in a calendar-clock system. The range of this property is not specified, so can be replaced by any specific representation of a calendar month from any calendar.
month.title: Month

day.description: Day position in a calendar-clock system. The range of this property is not specified, so can be replaced by any specific representation of a calendar day from any calendar.
day.title: Day

hour.description: Hour position in a calendar-clock system
hour.title: Hour

minute.description: Minute position in a calendar-clock system
minute.title: Minute

second.description: Second position in a calendar-clock system.
second.title: Second

dayOfYear.description: The number of the day within the year
dayOfYear.title: Dayofyear

dayOfWeek.description: The day of week, whose value is a member of the class time:DayOfWeek
dayOfWeek.title: Dayofweek

monthOfYear.description: The month of the year, whose value is a member of the class time:MonthOfYear
monthOfYear.title: Monthofyear

GeneralDateTimeDescription.title: GeneralDateTimeDescription

TimePosition.description:
A temporal position described using either a (nominal) value from an ordinal reference system,
or a (numeric) value in a temporal coordinate system.

nominalPosition.description: The (nominal) value indicating temporal position in an ordinal reference system
nominalPosition.title: Nominalposition

numericPosition.description: The (numeric) value indicating position within a temporal coordinate system
numericPosition.title: Numericposition

hasTRS.description: The temporal reference system used by a temporal position or extent description
hasTRS.title: Hastrs

TimePosition.title: TimePosition

description: A temporal entity with zero extent or duration

inXSDDate.description: Position of an instant, expressed using xsd:date
inXSDDate.title: Inxsddate

inXSDDateTime.description: (deprecated) Position of an instant, expressed using xsd:dateTime
inXSDDateTime.title: Inxsddatetime

inXSDDateTimeStamp.description: Position of an instant, expressed using xsd:dateTimeStamp, in which the time-zone field is mandatory
inXSDDateTimeStamp.title: Inxsddatetimestamp

inXSDgYear.description: Position of an instant, expressed using xsd:gYear
inXSDgYear.title: Inxsdgyear

inXSDgYearMonth.description: Position of an instant, expressed using xsd:gYearMonth
inXSDgYearMonth.title: Inxsdgyearmonth

inTimePosition.description: Position of an instant, expressed as a temporal coordinate or nominal val

inDateTime.description: Position of an instant, expressed using a structured description

title: TimeInstant
